title: Malaika Arora:Malaika Arora Rings In Her 46th Birthday With Close Friends And Family And It Was One Lavish Affair!
text:
Malaika Arora Rings In Her 46th Birthday With Close Friends And Family And It Was One Lavish Affair!

Malaika Arora Rings In Her 46th Birthday With Close Friends And Family And It Was One Lavish Affair!

Actress Malaika Arora is excited to celebrate her birthday in Mumbai with her friends and family after six years. The Bollywood diva turns 46 on Wednesday. After six years, Malaika chose to ring in her birthday in Mumbai, breaking her favourite tradition of holidaying with friends and family.

Talking to a news agency, Malaika said, "This is the first time in past 6-7 years that I am here in the city so I decided to bring my birthday in with my friends and family."

On Tuesday night, Malaika hosted a lavish birthday party for all her friends. Joining the party were all her close friends and family including Karisma Kapoor along with Amrita Arora, Janhvi Kapoor, Shanaya Kapoor, Ananya Panday, Arjun Rampal, Twinkle Khanna, Raj Kundra, Shilpa Shetty, Rajkummar Rao, Patralekha, Aadar Jain, Tara Sutaria at JW Mariott, Juhu.

Malaika’s son Arhaan Khan also attended the bash.
description: On Tuesday night, Malaika hosted a lavish birthday party for all her friends. Joining the party were all her close friends and family including Karisma Kapoor along with Amrita Arora, Janhvi Kapoor, Shanaya Kapoor, Ananya Panday, Arjun Rampal, Twinkle Khanna, Raj Kundra, Shilpa Shetty, Rajkummar Rao, Patralekha, Aadar Jain, Tara Sutaria at JW Mariott, Juhu.
